short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automate tests by recording test scenarios with TRUSTiiN Agent. Execute them seamlessly across browsers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TRUSTiiN Agent simplifies test creation with user-like interactions, automatically converting actions into test steps, facilitating easy and quick test creation for anyone. It provides the following innovative enhancements:

Self-healing: Implement an intelligent self-healing mechanism that automatically detects test application changes, requiring no manual intervention, and effortlessly self-heals with one-click confirmation. This dramatically reduces the time and effort spent on maintaining test scripts. Testers can focus on more strategic activities and improve overall testing efficiency.

Smart Locators: Improve the element locator strategy to use more reliable locators that are less likely to break with UI changes. This will make the recorded tests more stable and easier to maintain.

Smart Wait: Implement an intelligent wait mechanism that dynamically adapts to the page loading time and element visibility, reducing flakiness in tests caused by timing issues.
Reusable Steps: Introduce the ability to create and reuse modular test steps within recorded tests, promoting code reusability and reducing duplication.

Cross-Browser Compatibility: Improve the compatibility of recorded tests across multiple browsers, making the recorded tests more stable and easier to maintain.

Debugging: Enhance debugging capabilities with screenshots and results step by step, allowing the team to identify and resolve issues more efficiently.

By leveraging TRUSTiiN's advanced and intelligent capabilities, we make test creation, maintenance, and execution smoother and more reliable for testers of all levels of expertise. Enterprises gain quicker feedback on software quality, identify issues early, and respond rapidly to market demands.
